channel.description: Recent content in books on notes.tiago.dev

item.title: The Mental Load : What do Women think about?
item.description: I have recently read ‘The Mental Load: A Feminist Comic’ By Emma and I learned a lot! As I read each chapter, I took notes and today I reflected on them. I highly recommend this book to the women and men of your life.
